name: Electric Leap
description:
A 15 hour project just to see what I could do with my limited scripting knowledge.

It's a super simple match the stride game, pressing the right button at the right time.

Music was off newgrounds, lost the details of the composer so I'll be changing it very soon so I can give credit.

Note: hardest level and volume buttons don't work and a lot of the art is just a stand in. I hope to spruce it up a bit eventually.
